short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auto-Detect selected text as IP, hash, Error/Event code, domain, or URL, and offer multiple options for analysis on OSINT platforms.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically identify and categorize selected text as IP address, hash, Azure AD error code, Windows error code, Windows event code, domain, or URL, and provide various verification options through OSINT platforms.
